name: Libre (Kanonix)
description:
Libre ("Free" in english) is a student project that I realised during my studies.

The player will incarn a mental ill person who is in search of answers. What is happening to him ? Who are the people he can meet ? Are they good or evil ? Real or not ?

Listen to the various sounds and watch your environment closely in order to discover a world through the eyes of someone else.
